Name: Pilot Quirks
Description: Adds pilot abilities based upon what tags they have.
Author: don Zappo

TagIDToDescription.pilot_assassin: Decreased XP cost for leveling Gunnery. 10% Called shot Bonus
TagIDToDescription.pilot_bookish: Decreased XP cost for leveling Tactics. Increased XP cost for leveling Guts.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_cautious: Pilot has +2 Defense, but suffers a -1 to Accuracy.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_command: Bonus XP for every pilot in a lance if a Command Pilot is present.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_comstar: Decreased cost for Argo upgrades. +1 MechTech Skill.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_criminal: May Occasionally steal a few Cbills for you.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_dependable: Decreased chance of ejecting due to panic.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_disgraced: Decreased company morale while this pilot is around.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_dishonest: Causes different types of mischief every month.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_drunk: When Fatigued: +1 to-hit, -1 evasion pips, 100% chance to avoid ejection.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_gladiator: Less resolve lost when fatigued and does not get Low Spirits from fatigue.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_jinxed: Harder for this pilot to hit but also harder to be hit.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_klutz: Increased XP cost to level Piloting and a small chance to eject when knocked down.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_lostech: Increased chance to hit when using LosTech weapons.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_lucky: Reduced chance to suffer wounds in combat.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_merchant: Discount to buying items at shops.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_officer: Increased Resolve per turn if an Officer is in the lance.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_rebellious: Reduced Resolve when in combat with an Officer or the Company Commander.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_reckless: Increased chance to hit in combat while being easier to be hit by the enemy.
TagIDToDescription.pilot_wealthy: Pilot generates extra fatigue per mission and has no maximum fatigue days. -50% salary per month.
TagIDToDescription.commander_player: Increased Resolve per turn if an Officer or Commander is in the lance.
